column3: “The Ogre stomps out of the jar in large healthy nugs, dark overall in nature with deep forest greens and wild shoots of dark orange-brown hairs from every nook.  It breaks down easily and its sweet lemony pine kush aroma only gets stronger as you get into the heart of the bud.  A nice even burn, just harsh enough to let you know its there, with an equally pleasant release, followed by an almost instant need to sit do...”
“fire indica!! my all time favorite! used in treatment for PTSD, spasm/nausea, IBS and insomnia!!!. A definite must try if you prefer Indica”

“I smoked some of this with ma friends and its like, really good.  Its so good, I'm seriously having a lot of trouble typing this review.  I feel like  my whole body is made of jello.   Im really  hungry and feel like i should eat so im probably gonna do that. This weed is that kind of silly, munchy,  happy high. I like it a lot.”
“Relaxed and straight rocked. Like I was on the nod. Very heavy body effects and time slowed down.”

“I'm not going to lie, I enjoyed this strain a lot, but it's not worth anymore than $10 a gram from the local shop. It gives a decent high, but it's competition like Sour Diesel, Green Crack, and other well known strains at the shop over power my pocket. 

Orge gives a strong high. If you come across cheap Ogre (I got a gram for $8), I would definitely grab it up, but like I said before, I wouldn't donate anymore th...”

“Must find a good grow to begin. Dont look for lowest price actually look for highest price that will most likely be the best grown unless the co-op's just trying to sell mids for a high price. So make sure you check it before you buy it. Should be covered in crystals and the smell should be amazing. the bud structure should be sorta dense but similar to og kush thats been crossed with indica. 

I have Ogre from Loo...”

“Barely any smell to it which makes it an easy thing to hide. Although it is an indica, I didn't fall asleep fast. The creative side hit me like a brick. But overall if I could get it again, I would in a heartbeat”

“it's great. but I've noticed mostly everyone on this review is talking about ogre OG, The Ogre is a sensi star pheno, and that's what this thread is about. does anyone EVER go through these and delete the ones that aren't helpful/relevant? you guys should, people will get the wrong idea of this strain. The Ogre is a true knock out stone, not creative, or mellow. it takes no mercy. it's the kind of bud you take a coup...”

“Picked up an eighth of this because the budtender recommended it to me. It's a strain that's wonderful to smoke at the end of a long day. It provides a nice couch-lock yet keeps you awake. It's not going to put you straight to sleep but would still be a good strain to save for the evening. I struggle with back and knee pain and Ogre works wonders for me personally. After 2 or 3 trenches out of my MFLB and all of my p...”

“sweet, citrus/ammonia stench, super dense nugs, fair amount of amber trichs. bong hit produces a thick fog and a hacking cough. heavy indica high sets in over 5-10 minutes. produces very relaxing, body floating in warm molasses kind of feeling. excellent pain and stress relief, good for nausea, great for lack of appetite.”

“Master Kush x Bubba Kush = OGRE OG. 

One of the best indica strains I've had since Herijuana OG.

She has an earthy tone with skunky notes highlighting each toke. Hints of the Master Kush are noticeable; with a resiny earthyness you won't find from many other Kush strains. 

This is because Bubba Kush stems from the extremely potent mix of OG Kush and (West Coast Dog x Old World Kush).”

“Note, I am a total lightweight and take what are apparently considered itty-bitty hits. So, I always double-check descriptions on other sites, and it's recommended for evening, though it's apparently not a popular strain, and I don't know why. This is stunning in its ability to calm my shit FAST. I have severe bipolar disorder,  with a nasty side of anxiety. If I start to have a panic attack and I smoke just a little...”
“Shrek and I were talking it over then I couldn't hear him anymore because he smashed my head in so hard I couldn't think. Good strong Ingica, OGre OG is potent stuff.”

“Ogre Kush smells like straight skunky death mixed with a little fruit :3 so dank and smokes like an OG with a heady effect at start that quickly evolves to a body high . Good smoke but paid to much . CO buds.”

“Tight, Green, and dense buds stumbled into my water pipe with a thud! I lit the hemp wick and I burned those little ogres up--soon after that initial inhale, I paused-- then I exhaled and in that moment I realized, I got a head change. This stuff was good, most deferentially reminds me of stuff Ogres would smoke.”
“Also known as, 12th Man down! Always have some with me no matter what!!! 👌🏽 GO HAWKS!!!”
“Also known as, 12th Man down! Always have some with me no matter what!!! 👌🏽 GO HAWKS!!!”

“The strain I bought was called 'Ogre Kush' so I am not quite sure if it was this Ogre or Ogre crossed with some form of Kush - either way it was pretty damn good and it matched the other descriptions on here.  Will try again if I see it - not the greatest looking (altho not bad as all) nor the greatest smelling, but the buzz is very strong.  Couch Lock in higher quantities.”
“I liked the Ogre Og. Not one of the most potent of the og strains. Did make me feel clear headed then goes straight to the body with a medium couchlock.”

“Ogre is a mind-melting awesome cross of two of the best kushes (Master Kush and my all-time favorite, Bubba Kush) and it certainly looks like it. The smell is quite unique, with a strong smell of lemon, leaving the traditional piney Kush smell just in the background. What makes this strain truly great is not just its genetics and aroma/flavor profile, but it's high. The potent body and mind high could be adequately d...”
“Really relaxing, takes pain away, total couch lock so beware!”

“Holy Heavy Hitter!!! (Be sitting down for this one.)
Ogre at Medicine Man smells soooo sweet and smooth.
It smells and tastes like the most wonderful Kush with a potent Grape, maybe even blueberry!  Either way this has to be my favorite!  
The effect is so Strong.  A very heavy indica with serious medicinal value, stopping cramps, pain, and nausea with more efficiency than modern medicine can provide or explain!”
“Beware the Ogre will slap you down in the friendliest way.”

“It has a nice relaxed high that puts me in a good mood. It helps with nausea pretty good, but it doesn't have the hunger causing effect as much as other strains I've had.

For me, I have to take this in a safe place, like my home, cause if I go out while high on this, I get paranoid like I'm gonna get busted or something. I would suggest doing this one at home.”

“Imagine being wrapped in the most comfortable blanket that emits happiness. That's the best description I can give of this strain. It's super happy, then incredibly melty soon followed by amazing sleep.  If you love a strong dose of euphoria right before bed, then this would be a great choice. Don't expect to get anything done. Nice.”

“Amazing Indica! It definitely mellows me out and keeps me out of my head. I definitely smoke this before bed as it does hit you hard! If your looking for something to help relax and put your mind at ease this is the perfect choice and the smell is fantastic also!”
“Peppery strain with a strong high. You'll love the way it makes your body feel. You'll keep your eyes closed.”
“why dont more stores sell this? it is far more superior than most of the fab indica out there.”

“Only had this beautiful bud once, but I remember it well. It's one of the strains that gets me up off of the couch rather than making me sink down into it with the giggles. Washed laundry, cooked dinner and cleaned the house that night. :3”
“Oh shit I was hit with an ogre's mace. I am so fucking blazed holy shit man.”

“Wow!  This was a great smoke!  I was so very very happy, ridiculously so, and skittles really tasted amazing today.  I ate a full course breakfast in the middle of the day too.  :)  Bonus with friends because of giggles or just chilling at home to tunes, having a me-day, is pretty fantastic.  This is just a plain ol' fantastical happiness smoke.”
“Very dank. loved the smell, look and taste. It had a bite to it though- made me cough a lot. didn't really care for the high i got but enjoyed it more when i mixed it with Blue Dream”
“why dont more stores sell this? it is far more superior than most of the fab indica out there.”
“Very dank. loved the smell, look and taste. It had a bite to it though- made me cough a lot. didn't really care for the high i got but enjoyed it more when i mixed it with Blue Dream”
“Oh shit I was hit with an ogre's mace. I am so fucking blazed holy shit man.”

“A nice body high that started a little up, almost like a sativa but not quite. The smell was amazing. Very fruity. A good taste too. The high mellowed out and gave me couch-lock, but in a good way. Made me very hungry. I liked it but I didn't love it. Others are better but this is a great starter strain or if you just want something easy,lazy, and mellow.”

“Grew this strain, yield wasn't as good expected, however... The buds were frosty and the aroma was one of strong citrus, leaning more towards Oranges than Lemons. It is potent in strength with a taste that is wonderful, very citrus with a hint of skunk. Typical indica high, euphoric and uplifted, while also being relaxing.”
“Had this in concentrate. OMG! I slept! It was a beautiful body and mind relaxing high, w/ a little giggle. :)”
“Probably my favorite strain ever! Ogre has the most uplifting and happy highs I've ever experienced. Cotton mouth gets pretty dry so keep a drink close by.”

“A fellow patient with Fibromyalgia was asking for a good replacement for her prescription GHB when she lost her insurance. 

I recommended OGRE this strain can make you NOD OUT. 

I find this strain helpful for my Fibromyalgia, insomnia, neuropathy, and abdominal issues. 

It's a strain so good it'll make you say Get out me'h swamp".”"

“This is a very mellow relaxation, with not much head high.  That's good because I don't want a head high.  I've been vaporizing the wax, and it's a little tingle on the throat, but not too bad.  It takes about 10 minutes after I vape for it to kick in for me, but I haven't vaped any other waxes, so I don't know if that's typical.”
“A solid top shelf strain with heavy immediate lasting high.”
“Great taste, easy to smoke”

“Cinderella 99' X Ogre 
(Sativa)                (Indica) 

Very relaxed in bed, enjoying music, reflective.”
“Probably my favorite strain ever! Ogre has the most uplifting and happy highs I've ever experienced. Cotton mouth gets pretty dry so keep a drink close by.”

“Very high THC value at 27.73% with 0.09% CBD, this somewhat head-high heavy strain was beautifully cultivated and cured, slightly sweet smell and delightful taste. Enjoy an alert and aware euphoria with the added benefit of later relaxation.”
“Beware the Ogre will slap you down in the friendliest way.”

“You pay what you get for and when I got the strain  ogre  I had doubts about it but the smell of it was really mild but the high was great it put me to sleep really easy  and I wanted it to make it last”
“Had me hallucinating like shrooms...literately. Looked at my hand and saw a pixelized snake slithering around it!!”
“A solid top shelf strain with heavy immediate lasting high.”

“Very high THC value at 27.73% with 0.09% CBD, this somewhat head-high heavy strain was beautifully cultivated and cured, slightly sweet smell and delightful taste. Enjoy an alert and aware euphoria with the added benefit of later relaxation.”
“Probably my favorite strain ever! Ogre has the most uplifting and happy highs I've ever experienced. Cotton mouth gets pretty dry so keep a drink close by.”

“Cinderella 99' X Ogre 
(Sativa)                (Indica) 

Very relaxed in bed, enjoying music, reflective.”
“really good”
“Great Flavor! Tastes like Fruit Loops, then burning. Only mid-CBD (Indica) level, so not too zoned out"
column4: but definitely laughed a lot. Seemed like more of a Sativa.”"

column3: “Beware the Ogre will slap you down in the friendliest way.”

“Grew this strain, yield wasn't as good expected, however... The buds were frosty and the aroma was one of strong citrus, leaning more towards Oranges than Lemons. It is potent in strength with a taste that is wonderful, very citrus with a hint of skunk. Typical indica high, euphoric and uplifted, while also being relaxing.”
“With this one I coughed way to much to enjoy. Could not finish any of it. Looking for relief not more problems.”
“Had me hallucinating like shrooms...literately. Looked at my hand and saw a pixelized snake slithering around it!!”

“You pay what you get for and when I got the strain  ogre  I had doubts about it but the smell of it was really mild but the high was great it put me to sleep really easy  and I wanted it to make it last”

“A nice body high that started a little up, almost like a sativa but not quite. The smell was amazing. Very fruity. A good taste too. The high mellowed out and gave me couch-lock, but in a good way. Made me very hungry. I liked it but I didn't love it. Others are better but this is a great starter strain or if you just want something easy,lazy, and mellow.”

“Cinderella 99' X Ogre 
(Sativa)                (Indica) 

Very relaxed in bed, enjoying music, reflective.”
“Probably my favorite strain ever! Ogre has the most uplifting and happy highs I've ever experienced. Cotton mouth gets pretty dry so keep a drink close by.”
“Beware the Ogre will slap you down in the friendliest way.”

“Great strain. Makes you happy, almost giddy. Very relaxing - great for use after a stressful day. Doesn't knock you out as much as most indicas. Didn't get paranoid like some people noted; I largely remained calm during trips outside. One of the only strains that I'd try twice.”
“Had me hallucinating like shrooms...literately. Looked at my hand and saw a pixelized snake slithering around it!!”
“Beware the Ogre will slap you down in the friendliest way.”
“Probably my favorite strain ever! Ogre has the most uplifting and happy highs I've ever experienced. Cotton mouth gets pretty dry so keep a drink close by.”

“Cinderella 99' X Ogre 
(Sativa)                (Indica) 

Very relaxed in bed, enjoying music, reflective.”
“A solid top shelf strain with heavy immediate lasting high.”
“It has me happy when i was just angry enough to flip a car. Body high is very soothing. Top 10 #9 slot”

“Can be used for Day or Night. Great for guaranteeing sleep. Great for just hanging out at laughing at tv and gets me hungry. Jovial high, leaning more lazy but can be functioning if taken earlier in the day. Anti-anxiety and stress breaker.”

“This is a strong one. If you smoke a good amount, you can hear everything like 200% louder. This is a pretty well balanced hybrid cause you got your trippy head high that turns into a sleepy body high. Also it gets you super h0rny. Once the high fades, you feel warm and sleepy.”
“Buds are very white and frosty nice light green color. Highly recommend for experienced users very heavy body stone!!”

“The first time I tried this was like wow. It's a great strain and will def put you in a chill state. Unfortunately after about a month I started feeling not much of an effect. Had to smoke more and more each time. It's great for occasional use but long term you may have a bit of a tolerance to it.”

“Not really sure why the overview describes it as a sativa it was explained to me as an indica and hit hard like one also wonderful tasting strain and gets you blasted like you wanna be straight cloud 9 with this bad boy.”
“Great Medicine! My now fave!”
“Nice bud, funky smell”
“Loved this strain. Usually not big on Indicas b/c they put us to sleep but this one was much more euphoric & exactly what we wanted.”
“Great to use before bed and for meditation.”

“It’s been a long time since I’ve smoked this strain, but I remember it well. The high is very much behind the eyes and gives you a tight headband feeling. It’s a Stoney High that makes you feel stoned af. This is a good night time strain imo, because after smoking this I was always asleep within a couple hours. The high has a slight heady feeling that can actually make me wake up with a headache if I smoked too much....”
“great a must try”
“Very very introspective”

“Ogre is one of my favorites.
It is a calming indica high that helps my sore muscles & leaves me feeling productive & spontaneous.”
“Not impressed whatsoever. Pretty generic high, nothing to brag about. I won't buy again.”
“Really clean and relaxing. Makes me feel more in touch with visuals and my surroundings and I tap into a more creative mindset. Definitely euphoric.”

“the initial rush from this one is amazing. great flavor, beautiful dense buds, my body feels lighter almost as if I am vibrating on some other level of awareness. my mental state is currently relaxed. almost euphoric and slightly giggly". I feel a small increase to my desire to be creative. mostly I really just want to cook something amazing. absolutely try this one from #evergreenmarket”"
“Tasted great and delivered quite potently via Pax and Volcano. Helped with relaxing and sleeping, mitigated grief-induced anxiety.”
“Tasted great and delivered quite potently via Pax and Volcano. Helped with relaxing and sleeping, mitigated grief-induced anxiety.”
“This strain is one of my favorites. Perfect for evenings and calming nerves. Don’t underestimate this one!”

“A nice hybrid strain! It came in midsize green nugs, with lots of small brown trichomes all over. It has a musky smell, with lemon undertones. Overall, it left me feeling relaxed and in a positive state of mind. However, heavy use will likely make you tired. I'd recommend Ogre, if you're looking for a solid hybrid!”
“perfect for bed time!”
“WOW just wow this strain kick's ass! Great ALL the way around!”
“Wow! Hits you with a lemony-fruity smell right away. Dark orange hairs and crystals cover the buds (which are darker green w/ light green leafs around).”
“Skunky mango scent”
“Clean taste, smooth smoke, good buzz. good value.”
“WOW just wow this strain kick's ass! Great ALL the way around!”
“A power house indica. Do your chores first because this little beast will slow you down in a cloud of pleasant euphoric pain free bliss.”
“Wow! Hits you with a lemony-fruity smell right away. Dark orange hairs and crystals cover the buds (which are darker green w/ light green leafs around).”
“Skunky mango scent”
“Clean taste, smooth smoke, good buzz. good value.”
“pretty good strain that had me talkin people's ears off. Energetic head high that had me thinkin' all introspective for hours. good for chillin”
“One of those lazy, eat a bunch of awesome food, and watch the funniest show in the world type of highs.”

“Ohhh how i underestimated this strain... The bud itself was beautifully packed with white crystals with bright green color and dark brown hairs, it almost looked like candy to me. I mixed it with a sprinkle of bubba kush and was sent off on a psychedelic ride and locked into the chair as soon as i sat down. I had to find strength to type this review, talk about relaxed... Bruh. This is in the top 5 instantly”
“pretty good strain that had me talkin people's ears off. Energetic head high that had me thinkin' all introspective for hours. good for chillin”
“Very nice indica. Very cerebral, very sedate. Very.”
“Really cool strain. Killed my anxiety and helped me go with the flow.”

“this strain is very relaxing:) I got slapped by my friends daughter and didn't feel a thing hahaha. this strain will make u not worry about nothing meaning no paranoia. but not the best, this is my first review so I'm gunna be honest it burns really nice been smokin a bunt for 20 min..taste is lemony but 1 of my favorites .”
“One of those lazy, eat a bunch of awesome food, and watch the funniest show in the world type of highs.”
“Great strain really chill”

“Ohhh how i underestimated this strain... The bud itself was beautifully packed with white crystals with bright green color and dark brown hairs, it almost looked like candy to me. I mixed it with a sprinkle of bubba kush and was sent off on a psychedelic ride and locked into the chair as soon as i sat down. I had to find strength to type this review, talk about relaxed... Bruh. This is in the top 5 instantly”
“great get off of work and smoke bud. feel it in your head and body. okay flavor and not to ruff”
“Very nice indica. Very cerebral, very sedate. Very.”
“Really cool strain. Killed my anxiety and helped me go with the flow.”

“this strain is very relaxing:) I got slapped by my friends daughter and didn't feel a thing hahaha. this strain will make u not worry about nothing meaning no paranoia. but not the best, this is my first review so I'm gunna be honest it burns really nice been smokin a bunt for 20 min..taste is lemony but 1 of my favorites .”
“It's always a pleasure to smoke this. Good mild high, good for afternoons or nights.”
“Great strain really chill”
“Great Medicine! My now fave!”

“Oh yeah I agree wi above review of JackDaniel. Re: Family Guy ... I'm finding that this kick ass strain also pairs remarkably well with South Park .... it's a deep high but it's nice...I would recommend this strain to some who want to see what it's like to take it up a notch " in strain quality:”"

“Ogre is wonderfully divine in the full body high that takes you to another realm of thinking, gets me moving and uplifting in a total euphoric way... 

get high, so high that i feel like lying, down in a cigar, roll me up and smoke me cause, I feel like dying, haha
swimming laps, around a bottle of, Louie the 13, jumping off of a mountain, into a sea of codine,
I'm at the top of the top, but still I climb, and if I s...”
“Great to use before bed and for meditation.”
“Second time trying. Daytime high. Better when fully experienced and not muddled by tiredness.”
“Damn this was one strain I will buy anytime I find it. The ogre I got at Az Med Massage was one of my favorites I have gotten from there. Gotta try it”
“Loved this strain. Usually not big on Indicas b/c they put us to sleep but this one was much more euphoric & exactly what we wanted.”
“its a nicee indica ! no lie i would be happy if i can get this again.”

“Great Indica strain very relaxing and euphoric not too sleepy though which is nice for me. Plenty strong and stoney. Would definitely buy this one again, nice citrus flavor very dense frosty buds great quality.”

“Overall a wonderful time. When it comes to kushes i prefer to have just a few large hits as it seems to prevent the couchlock phenomenon without diminishing the psychoactive and bodily feels. Smells great and tastes great and great for mixing with tobacco for spliffs! Calm cool and collected were the name of this relaxing ultimate kush crossing”
“Relaxed, lazy, happy and relieved”
“I think the parents are master Kush and bubba kush”
“tried this for the first time recently.love it.great for relaxing...try it”
“Very very introspective”
“Not impressed whatsoever. Pretty generic high, nothing to brag about. I won't buy again.”
“This strain is one of my favorites. Perfect for evenings and calming nerves. Don’t underestimate this one!”
“This is the best weed I have ever smoked. We got like 3oz of it and it was the best happy, uplifting feeling during the whole high. This is in my top 5 best.”
“GREAT!!! I feel rejuvenated. No Anxiety/Stress. I definitely will pickup anytime i can get a hold of it.”

“One of the most potent strains I've smoked all year. When ya smoke it you can smell it blocks away. If your building a tolerance from the strains your smoking Ogre will make it feel like the first time all over again.”
“Best strain ever!”
“Loved this strain. Usually not big on Indicas b/c they put us to sleep but this one was much more euphoric & exactly what we wanted.”
“Loved this strain. Usually not big on Indicas b/c they put us to sleep but this one was much more euphoric & exactly what we wanted.”

“it's ok. nothing crazy. good indica high. wasn't a fan of the resin taste it 
produces in a doobie. other than that it was quality. can't complain for an indica strain”
“A fantastic long lasting relaxed high”

“Nuggles; sizing used to describe this flower. For what it lacks in size it definitely makes up for in potency. A fantastic and euphoric buzz that lasted for a couple of hours! I was very surprised that it had a pungent piney smell when canister was opened. The mason jar it was being held in did not have that much rezin coating the sides and was skeptical but I am glad I went with the budtenders recommendation. I was ...”
“Great smooth body high! One of my favs”
“literally nuts how heavy the body high is”

“Ohhh how i underestimated this strain... The bud itself was beautifully packed with white crystals with bright green color and dark brown hairs, it almost looked like candy to me. I mixed it with a sprinkle of bubba kush and was sent off on a psychedelic ride and locked into the chair as soon as i sat down. I had to find strength to type this review, talk about relaxed... Bruh. This is in the top 5 instantly”

“Amazing buds!! Not just saying that cause it was my nickname in school lol. Such a strong earthy skunk smell and taste reminded me of the first dank buds I ever smoked. Best for night time I feel just that helps me to be mellow. Try this and love it or piss off!!”

“This is a new favorite for me. Smells like lemon grass. I really like the effects of the high. It's potent yet mellow and relaxing with a head buzz. I personally think this strain doesn't give me too cotton mouth. Would recommend & I hope to find it again”
“Nice strain, a little overpowering when it came to the fatigue though and that isn't something I look for in a strain.”
“semi light green good taste little bit of an upper but still has an indica feel to it.good day time med.breaks up good.would recommend if not gdp ur a good indica”

“Intense body high indeed. A master for stress-killin. The resin formed quicker the usual in my pipe with this one but the globs it created made for a gooey good addition to a cigarette for sure. Got me high as balls. Good stuff. Not too head heavy by any means. Great for pain. Smells nice when hotboxed. Also a super nausea killer.”
“Sweet after taste and clean smoke.  Great strong body high. good for relaxation and sleep.  watch the dizziness tho”
“Sweet, not to Earthy, pungent lemony scent, medium dense buds not dried out but we'll cured, frosty trichomes, nice pistols, great body high. Very happy with this flower!”
“tasty”
“Krinks Ogre kush is the best.”

“It’s been a long time since I’ve smoked this strain, but I remember it well. The high is very much behind the eyes and gives you a tight headband feeling. It’s a Stoney High that makes you feel stoned af. This is a good night time strain imo, because after smoking this I was always asleep within a couple hours. The high has a slight heady feeling that can actually make me wake up with a headache if I smoked too much....”
“This will definitely make you feel calm and relaxed. It mellowed me out so much. Really nice smell, not too pungent but does leave one with very dry mouth.”

“A nice hybrid strain! It came in midsize green nugs, with lots of small brown trichomes all over. It has a musky smell, with lemon undertones. Overall, it left me feeling relaxed and in a positive state of mind. However, heavy use will likely make you tired. I'd recommend Ogre, if you're looking for a solid hybrid!”
“Copped: Grass Roots”
“Good for sleep.”
“Smells like the description! Sweet lemony! Taste like total dirt though! And not in a bad way, just taste like it's super organic! Great head high!”
“pretty good stuff!!!”
“strong high. felt like a just received a full body massage. strong scent. and dense”
“Super nice body high. This indica will have you indacouch”
“Wow”
“Barely noticeable until I feel really heavy, but not tired. Mildly uplifting.”
“favorite”
“At first the smell reminded me of SLH but the taste and effects were definitely not. Nice heavy indica that was exactly what I needed. Awesome body stone”

“Smokes a little harsh with some citrus aftertaste. Not unpleasant, but does not taste great. Was the perfect strain to check out but not be sleepy. SUPER couch lock, but mind was racing (but completely random/unfocused). Dry mouth and eyes, but worth it.”
“Great strain. On the heavy side obviously. Great for digestive and nauseousness. Must try...”
“This one nocks me out fast so I almost never do just this alone, I'll often mix it with something else. Its great for insomnia but that's about it for me.”

“Very stony, looks are very deceiving on this tasty girl. I'm a fan, seems along the flavor lines of GDP but has kick of a strong GSC. Any strain that breaks 27% threshold is a good one in my book so long as terps come too!! This bud lives to its name very ugly but SO good easy smoke this all day”

“Not really sure why the overview describes it as a sativa it was explained to me as an indica and hit hard like one also wonderful tasting strain and gets you blasted like you wanna be straight cloud 9 with this bad boy.”
“Ogre = master kush X pre 98 bubba facts”
“Doesn't dry your mouth out, pretty smooth on the throat. Not hyper kind of strain, but awake, happy, and relaxed. Awesome in joints.”

“I got some Ogre from Collective awakenings. I have a high tolerence and this still helps me sleep. Smells awesome, but the crop i got could have been better. I am interested in what the nice top cola looks like.”

“Thus far this is one of my favorite strains, I normally got a nice steady high thats great for work sfter one hit.
While the smell isn't skunky" it is strong so to be courteous of the neighbors and smoke downwind. I would almost describe the smell as a slightly rotten lemon juice squeezed into some dirt.

column1: The head high was pure focus and bliss for me. It helped me get so much done and made me feel so productive.

column3: “First time trying this strain. I have server pain in my legs and feet. This product works very well for my pains. I would also note in my opinion is very similar at Trenity.  Arousing and *uplifting.”
“great body high surely doesn't make me too tired.”

“Combines two of my favorites ; bubba kush x master kush. The flowers are beautiful, large ultra dense ,sticky sticky sticky, incredible potent (22%+) np.  I'm a mostly indica smoker so love this during day or night .  I would not recommend to the average" smoker during the day bc it will have you couch locked. Great for insomnia
column4: stress etc. the flowers I'm used to seeing are A quality
column5: and I'd include this one. It...”"

column3: “Great indica. Don't smoke in the day time, the slender man will kill you.”
“perfect for bed time!”
“Relaxing, focused. Very good. Highly recommend. Can't go wrong with this strain.”
“this ogre strain has got me so high I'm talking to god an shit beautiful crystal covered nugs taste is great very pungent 10/10 overall”

“I like this strain because when I hit it is is a very in control high. it's one of those highs where you know you're messed but yet you can continue activities. definitely a evening kind of strain. also, when you take a hit the smoke seems mellow, at least to me.”
“gets the job done but makes me way too sleepy for my taste.”

“Ogre is a strain that surprised my senses in several ways.  Was not a first pick, nor second, in fact it was eventually chosen by default being the only one affordable on my budget that day.  The buds were medium to large, very dense, and that weird brownish- purple hue seen in many Kush strains.  This flower may have been named for it's size & yield, but it is ugly like an Ogre (no offense Shrek).  To each his own. ...”

“Yet again I find my favorite on the way home off the MAX at green  sky, $30 for 2G and just two dense buds very frost under the scope. As usual 1-2 bong rips everything is very nice. On this particular run there seems to be a sweet aftertaste of HONEY, ever heard of that??? I could smoke this all night long top five as usual!”

“one hit i was good. felt it in the head, but only briefly. high then moved into the rest of my body. crazy munchies after about 20-30 minutes after i smoke so I'd recommend bringing some snacks along before you smoke this strain. really good for muscle spasms and pain, considering I hurt my back two weeks ago. also good for knocking someone out if you wanna sleep. good beginner strain. not overwhelming at all. very c...”
“It's too good.”
“Not the biggest straight indica fan but this stuff was great! Very uplifting and euphoric, not too heavy so it didn't make me sleepy yet was really relaxed and happy.”
“Calming chill buzz”
“Awesome strain. Relaxed and happy. Would be my flower of choice.”
“Skunky mango scent”

“4 star head banger. Ogre is legendary for a deep and stony high. Clouds the head, relaxes, and provides a deep rooted body high with a very deep mental relaxant as well. Great before bed, also great if you want to walk around like a zombie during the day.”
“Very dry mouth but great head high. Just a little at a time suits me best unless I’m just trying to watch a movie and sleep. Then a whole blunt does you good.”
“That shit makes me cough”
“New to me”
“Very good master and bubba mix.  Strong and sticky nugs.  Helped with some acute shoulder pain I have been having.”
“it has a very distinct taste. very yum. helps a lot with stress. good bedtime bud.”
“Makes me creative and focused. Love to smoke”
“cough a lot on this one”
“I love it!!!”
“it's barely ok. like a very mild mild OG KUSH high (best way to describe it) very mild smoke.”

“wow I used to buy this in California its one of the most popular med strains there. then i see it in everett of all places I picked some up and it was better than 99% of whats in California. it was by dna gardens at mari j's highway pot shop”
“You all must try grinding Ogre and Headband together.  Creative euphoria abounds!”
“pungent, sweet flavor, quick body buzz, long euphoric.”
“One of those lazy, eat a bunch of awesome food, and watch the funniest show in the world type of highs.”
“Clean taste, smooth smoke, good buzz. good value.”
“Wow! Hits you with a lemony-fruity smell right away. Dark orange hairs and crystals cover the buds (which are darker green w/ light green leafs around).”
“great for pain relief.  can feel almost immediate warmth in my stomach.”
“Tasted great and delivered quite potently via Pax and Volcano. Helped with relaxing and sleeping, mitigated grief-induced anxiety.”

“the initial rush from this one is amazing. great flavor, beautiful dense buds, my body feels lighter almost as if I am vibrating on some other level of awareness. my mental state is currently relaxed. almost euphoric and slightly giggly". I feel a small increase to my desire to be creative. mostly I really just want to cook something amazing. absolutely try this one from #evergreenmarket”"
“Really clean and relaxing. Makes me feel more in touch with visuals and my surroundings and I tap into a more creative mindset. Definitely euphoric.”
“Will knock you the F*** out!”

“Ogre is one of my favorites.
It is a calming indica high that helps my sore muscles & leaves me feeling productive & spontaneous.”
“great a must try”
“Loved this strain. Usually not big on Indicas b/c they put us to sleep but this one was much more euphoric & exactly what we wanted.”

“Man this s*** really helps when you have bad anxiety. I took two totes from my vape pen and my anxiety just disappeared, even in the middle of a panic attack this stuff works wonders. Puts you right on the couch and then right to sleep!”
“Loved this strain. Usually not big on Indicas b/c they put us to sleep but this one was much more euphoric & exactly what we wanted.”
“Nice bud, funky smell”
“im loving my couch tonight. my back isnt tense and I am in chill mode.”

“Not really sure why the overview describes it as a sativa it was explained to me as an indica and hit hard like one also wonderful tasting strain and gets you blasted like you wanna be straight cloud 9 with this bad boy.”
“It's very potent diesely smell it has a good taste to it and seemed to really help knock me out at night it's a good high to with good thc levels”

“The first time I tried this was like wow. It's a great strain and will def put you in a chill state. Unfortunately after about a month I started feeling not much of an effect. Had to smoke more and more each time. It's great for occasional use but long term you may have a bit of a tolerance to it.”
“Buds are very white and frosty nice light green color. Highly recommend for experienced users very heavy body stone!!”
“smells very unique with a overpowering skunk smell when smoked.. i thought it was going to get me really high because of the smell but it didn't get me that high. ok strain.”
“It put me to bed no trouble sleeping”
“Very bold lemony taste.. Extreme body high... Knocks you on your ass. Recommened for deep relaxation. Not a good wake n bake due to extreme body on your ass" high.”"
“Made me paranoid. Tripped balls!!!”
“Vary good for people with a broken foot an does construction”
“This is super chill(:”
“A boring strain. I would almost call this ditch.”
“Kind of disappointment at first, but still dank. high is more comparable to a sativa.”

“Orge is a very decent strain. It has some upsides but it is very mediocre depending on where you get it from. The first time I smoked it, it was ok. But the next day I smoked a joint of it and after the high I had a headache all day after and I was out of weed so.......... 2/5”
“good flower to medicate, make sure flower is cured and frosty before making ne buys”
